lines.gurmukhi: nvn gvn jl sIql Aml jYsy Agin aurD muK qpq mlIn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Navan Gavan Jal Seetal Amal Jaisay , Agani Uradh Moukh Tapat Maleen Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as water flowing downward remains cool and clear of contamination but fire that goes upward causes heat and pollution;

lines.gurmukhi: sPl huie AwNb Juky rhq hY icrMkwl invY n AirMfu qwN qy Awrblw CIn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Sadhal Hui Aanb Jhoukay Rahat Hai Chirankaala , Nivai N Arindu Taan Tay Aarabalaa Chheen Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a mango tree bends down when it yields fruit, and lives a long life, but a castor oil seed plant does not bend. It would break if we bend it, it breaks. Thus it has a short span of life.

lines.gurmukhi: cMdn subws jYsy bwsIAY bnwspqI bwsu qau bfweI bUifE sMg ilvlIn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Chandan Soubaas Jaisay Baaseeai Banaasapatee , Baasu Tau Badaaee Boodiao Sang Livaleen Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as the sweet smell of a small sized sandalwood tree gets infused in the vegetation around it, but a tall and high bamboo plant arrogant of its size absorbs no fragrance of the sandalwood tree.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy hI AswD swD AhMbuiD inMmRqw kY sn Aau mjIT giq pwp puMn kIn hY ]306]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Hee Asaadh Saadh Ahanbudhi Ninmrataa Kai , San Au Majeetth Gati Paap Pounn Keen Hai ?306?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly evil and apostate people bound by their pride and ego commit sins. On the contrary those good people who live in the way of the Guru and are humble, do good work like Rubia munjista (Majith). (The fibre for making a rope grows high up and is use
